title: Manohari Kundan Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with meticulous Kundan Setting. Features uncut Polki diamonds with rose-cut style
and a central emerald gemstone. Hyderabadi Polish enhances the gold's lustrous sheen. Includes high quality simulated stones.
features: These handcrafted Jhumka earrings feature a classic floral design with intricate Kundan work. The peacock motif at the top with bright ruby stones and a centrally placed emerald. The Jhumka's bell-shaped bottom showcases cascading ruby beads, creating a graceful sway with every movement. The Kundan stones are carefully placed within the gold framework, showcasing traditional Indian craftsmanship.
colors: White (Kundan diamonds). The vibrant color combination is traditionally auspicious.
occasions: and other festive occasions. Also suitable for upscale events where you wish to make a statement with traditional Indian elegance.
description: These Jhumka earrings are a testament to exquisite South Indian artistry, combining the timeless elegance of Kundan with the vibrant colors of traditional gemstones. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. Each piece is carefully handcrafted by skilled artisans, making it a valuable heirloom to be treasured for generations. Comfortable to wear despite its rich appearance. Adds an ethereal element to your look.
